text: Apne Facebook business page ko connect karein aur apna pehla Facebook ad campaign create karein.  Target audience ko carefully select karein.
Apne ideal customer ko target karein unke interests, demographics, aur behavior ke hisab se.  Is se aapke ads sirf relevant logon tak hi pahunchenge.
Apne budget ko wisely allocate karein.  Shuruat mein chote campaigns se start karein aur results ke hisab se adjust karein. Aapke budget pe depend karta hai kitne leads generate honge.

Regularly apne campaign ki performance monitor karein.  Conversion rates, cost per lead, aur other KPIs check karein.  Data ke analysis se apne ads ko optimize karein aur better results achieve karein.
